frame.name: LottoMoji
frame.description: A fun emoji-based lottery game where you match 4 emojis to win prizes. Generate tickets and test your luck! Connect your Coinbase Wallet to play.

notificationTypes.title: Win Notification
notificationTypes.description: Get notified when you win a prize

notificationTypes.title: Draw Notification
notificationTypes.description: Get notified when a new draw is about to happen
